fun.connor.lighter.testutils

Class TestRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • fun.connor.lighter.testutils.TestRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Request

    public class TestRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements Request
    Implementation of request using in-memory data structures in its implementation. This is useful for creating requests for testing (which is sometimes required for methods which are either directly or indirectly dependent on the raw request).

    The methods on this class do what they appear to. See Request for details.
